page.title: 09LEISURE AND SPORTS
page.content: OUR FOOTBALL AND CRICKET TEAMS PLAY MATCHES ON THE GREEN.MY UNCLE WHO LIVES IN OUR BLOCK PLAYS IN THE FOOTBALL AND CRICKET TEAMS.HE ALSO PLAYS IN THE TABLE TENNIS CLUB.THE BOYS HAVE CUBS EVERY WEDNESDAY AND THE GIRLS HAVE BROWNIES EVERY TUESDAY EVENING .THERE IS AN ATHLETICS CLUB AFTER SCHOOL FOR BOYS AND GIRLS. WE HAVE A SCHOOL SOCIETY AND MY DAD IS CHAIRMAN OF IT.HE DOES LOTS OF POSTERS FOR IT BECAUSE THEY ORGANISE SALES AND FETES AND THEN SPEND THE MONEY ON THINGS FOR US AT SCHOOL.THE PARENTS OF THE LITTLE CHILDREN RUN A PLAYGROUP AND TODDLERS GROUP FOR THEM IN AN EMPTY CLASSROOM IN THE SCHOOL.WE HAVE A MOTHERS UNION IN OUR BLOCK AND MY MUM GOES TO IT AND SHE SAID THAT THEY HAVE LOTS OF QUIZZES TO DO.
